meanings.sent1: The teacher often had to deal with woodenheads in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a woodenheads and make sure to think before you act.
meanings.sent3: The woodenheads in the story always made everyone laugh with their silly mistakes.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a woodenheads when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent5: The woodenheads in the group always seemed to find trouble wherever they went.

meanings.sent1: She felt like a woodenheads when she couldn't solve the simple puzzle.

meanings.sent4: His refusal to listen to advice only proved him to be a woodenheads.
